H3.text: what team does david beckham play for in 2012. LA Galaxy

A4.text: returned to Galaxy and won the MLS Cup in 2011 and 2012

A5.text: Following a four-month stint at Paris Saint-Germain, he retired in May 2013

A6.text: Beckham confirmed in November 2012 that he would be leaving the Galaxy at the end of the 2012 MLS season

A7.text: In January 2012, after much speculation, Beckham signed a new two-year deal with LA to secure his short-term future at the club
